eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Low T males 18 - 80 years of age

Exclusion Criteria:

* Normal T levels
* Elevated Prostatic Specific Antigen (PSA)

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Subjects on Testosterone Treatment Achieving Target Range for Testosterone Cav (Time-averaged Concentration Over the Dosing Interval of 24 Hours) on Day 112
outcomeMeasures.description: Cav results were required to fall within the normal range of 300-1000 ng/dL. Success in the study was defined as \>=75% of subjects on active treatment within the normal serum testosterone concentration range of 300-1000 ng/dL. In addition, the lower bound of the 95% CI was to be not less than 65% based on the Day 112 Parmacokinetics (PK) results

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Subjects on Testosterone Treatment Achieving Target Range for Testosterone Cav (Time-averaged Concentration Over the Dosing Interval of 24 Hours) on Day 14
outcomeMeasures.description: Cav results were required to fall within the normal range of 300-1000 ng/dL at Day 14. Success was defined as \>=75% of subjects on active treatment within the normal serum testosterone concentration range of 300-1000 ng/dL. In addition, the lower bound of the 95% CI was to be not less than 65% based on the Day 14 PK results

outcomeMeasures.description: Cav results were required to fall within the normal range of 300-1000 ng/dL at Day 56. outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Subjects on Testosterone Treatment Achieving Target Range for Testosterone Cav (Time-averaged Concentration Over the Dosing Interval of 24 Hours) on Day 182

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Subjects Achieving Target Range for Testosterone Cav During the Open-label Period at Day 266.
outcomeMeasures.description: The success at Day 266 was defined as \>=75% of subjects within the normal serum total testosterone concentration range of 300-1000 ng/dL. The Lower bounds of the 95% CI was to be not less than 65%.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Subjects Achieving Target Range for Testosterone Cav During the Open-label Period at Day 364.
outcomeMeasures.description: The success at Day 364 was defined as \>=75% of subjects within the normal serum total testosterone concentration range of 300-1000 ng/dL. The Lower bounds of the 95% CI was to be not less than 65%.
